this will not work under the new 10.5.2 update...
but here is how you make it work....

download from here

open to run the demo...it will ask you if you would like to update...click yes...

goto user(this is your account)/lib/pref folder and replace with one that came with this torrent...

enjoy...

do not forget to little snitch, block from apple firewall or just turn off the internet when using...

This is driving me sick. I have 10.5.2 with the latest security update. I followed all steps suggested various times as suggest by [[[[djinn]]]].

Starting from scratch I get in the top a yellow band saying: Unqualified system! Update Candybar or proceed at your own risk". And it is in demo mode.

I do the upgrade, with Little Snitch temporary enabled, it updates fine but still staying in demo mode (250 icons limit and 14 days left).

michelasso,

hmm... I wonder if there is a .plist in you system library? i would goto lib/ pref and look to see it is one in there...if so, just delete... when you added the .plist from torrent, did you installing into your account lib/pref folder? i doubled checked my instructions and it said that it was expired, but i quit candybar and re-installed the .plist in my account lib/pref and then it worked.

i hope this helps

First time I did this, it told me my trial was up.  I deleted the app and anything related to it.  Then I reinstalled the app and everything else works fine.
works perfect just drag to apps, let it update then quit out of candybar go to your security settings and block candybar in firewall from incoming connections.

just to clarify for people, the readme says to copy the .plist file to /Library/preferences

YOU ACTUALLY NEED TO COPY IT TO users/library/preferences (it will ask you to replace  a current file. say yes)

also like the file says you need to deny with little snitch
